name: test_edit_vaccination_dose_to_not_given
description:
Test: Edit a vaccination dose to 'not given' and verify outcome.
Steps:
1. Navigate to the child in the programme.
2. Edit the vaccination record and change outcome to 'they refused it'.
3. Save changes.
Verification:
- Alert confirms vaccination outcome recorded as refused.
descriptionHtml:
Test: Edit a vaccination dose to 'not given' and verify outcome.
Steps:

  1. Navigate to the child in the programme.
  2. Edit the vaccination record and change outcome to 'they refused it'.
  3. Save changes.
    Verification:
  • Alert confirms vaccination outcome recorded as refused.
statusMessage:
playwright._impl._errors.TimeoutError: Locator.click: Timeout 30000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - waiting for locator("section").filter(has=get_by_role("heading", name="Vaccinations")).get_by_role("row").filter(has_text="HPV").get_by_role("link")
statusTrace:
upload_vaccination = None
programmes_list_page = <mavis.test.pages.programmes.ProgrammesListPage object at 0x7fb0a6f39e10>
programme_children_page = <mavis.test.pages.programmes.ProgrammeChildrenPage object at 0x7fb0a6f39f20>
programme_overview_page = <mavis.test.pages.programmes.ProgrammeOverviewPage object at 0x7fb0a6f3a030>
vaccination_record_page = <mavis.test.pages.vaccination_record.VaccinationRecordPage object at 0x7fb0ac8ed550>
edit_vaccination_record_page = <mavis.test.pages.vaccination_record.EditVaccinationRecordPage object at 0x7fb0ac8ed6a0>
children_page = <mavis.test.pages.children.ChildrenPage object at 0x7fb0ac4f1310>
children = {'HPV': [Child(first_name='Michael', last_name='BIRD', nhs_number='9899780677', address=('Studio 47Y', 'Luke springs',...@example.net'), Parent(full_name='Gillian Edwards', relationship='Mum', email_address='callumrobinson@example.com')))]}

    @pytest.mark.rav
    @pytest.mark.bug
    def test_edit_vaccination_dose_to_not_given(
        upload_vaccination,
        programmes_list_page,
        programme_children_page,
        programme_overview_page,
        vaccination_record_page,
        edit_vaccination_record_page,
        children_page,
        children,
    ):
        """
        Test: Edit a vaccination dose to 'not given' and verify outcome.
        Steps:
        1. Navigate to the child in the programme.
        2. Edit the vaccination record and change outcome to 'they refused it'.
        3. Save changes.
        Verification:
        - Alert confirms vaccination outcome recorded as refused.
        """
        child = children[Programme.HPV][0]
    
        programmes_list_page.click_programme_for_current_year(Programme.HPV)
        programme_overview_page.click_children_tab()
        programme_children_page.search_for_child(child)
        programme_children_page.click_child(child)
>       children_page.click_vaccination_details(Programme.HPV)
